name: HTL-2025-0001
hotel_description: The Budget Inn London offers affordable accommodation in the heart of King's Cross. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers looking for basic amenities and a central location.
facilities: 24-hour front desk, Free WiFi in lobby, Luggage storage, Vending machines, Shared kitchen
room_types: Single rooms, Twin rooms, Triple rooms
cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in. No refund for no-shows.
certifications: Basic Fire Safety Certificate
notes: Popular with backpackers and students

name: HTL-2025-0002
hotel_description: Paddington Hostel & Hotel provides budget accommodation near Hyde Park and Paddington Station. Mix of private rooms and dormitory-style accommodation.
facilities: Shared lounge, Communal kitchen, Laundry facilities, Lockers, Tourist information desk
room_types: Dormitory beds, Private single rooms, Private double rooms
cancellation_policy: 48-hour cancellation policy for full refund.
certifications: Youth Hostel Association Member
notes: Great for young travelers and backpackers

name: HTL-2025-0003
hotel_description: Westminster Lodge Hotel offers comfortable budget accommodation near Victoria Station and Westminster Abbey. Ideal for tourists and business travelers on a budget.
facilities: Free WiFi, Continental breakfast, 24-hour reception, Luggage storage, Tour desk, Lift access
room_types: Standard single, Standard double, Twin rooms, Family rooms
cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before arrival.
certifications: AA 2 Star Rating, Visit Britain Approved
notes: Close to major tourist attractions

name: HTL-2025-0004
hotel_description: Camden Town Inn is a vibrant budget hotel in the heart of Camden Market area. Perfect for those wanting to experience London's alternative culture.
facilities: Free WiFi throughout, Bar, Breakfast room, 24-hour front desk, ATM on site
room_types: Compact singles, Standard doubles, Superior doubles, Triple rooms
cancellation_policy: Non-refundable rate available. Flexible rate allows cancellation up to 48 hours.
certifications: Green Tourism Bronze Award
notes: Popular with music lovers and young travelers

name: HTL-2025-0005
hotel_description: The Kensington Gardens Hotel is a charming Victorian property offering comfortable accommodation near Hyde Park. Combines period features with modern amenities.
facilities: Restaurant, Bar, Room service, Free WiFi, Business center, Concierge service, Garden terrace, Meeting rooms
room_types: Classic single, Classic double, Superior rooms, Deluxe rooms, Junior suites
cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before arrival. 50% charge for late cancellations.
certifications: AA 3 Star Rating, TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence
notes: Victorian architecture with modern comfort

name: HTL-2025-0006
hotel_description: Bloomsbury Square Hotel is perfectly located near the British Museum and Covent Garden. Georgian townhouse converted into a modern hotel.
facilities: Restaurant, Lounge bar, Fitness center, Business facilities, Laundry service, 24-hour room service, Conference rooms
room_types: Standard rooms, Executive rooms, Family rooms, Accessible rooms
cancellation_policy: Flexible rates with 72-hour cancellation. Non-refundable advance purchase rates available.
certifications: Visit London Gold Award, Sustainable Tourism Certified
notes: Literary heritage - many famous writers stayed here

name: HTL-2025-0007
hotel_description: The Mayfair Boutique Hotel offers sophisticated luxury in the heart of Mayfair. Contemporary design meets classic British elegance.
facilities: Fine dining restaurant, Cocktail bar, Spa & wellness center, Gym, Valet parking, Butler service, Business center, Private dining rooms
room_types: Deluxe rooms, Premier rooms, Junior suites, Executive suites, Penthouse suite
cancellation_policy: 14-day cancellation policy for peak season. 7-day for regular periods.
certifications: AA 4 Star Rating, Forbes Travel Guide Recommended, Green Key Certified
notes: Popular with business executives and celebrities

name: HTL-2025-0008
hotel_description: The Thames Riverside Hotel features stunning river views and modern facilities. Perfect for business travelers and tourists alike.
facilities: Riverside restaurant, Sky bar, Conference center, Spa, Indoor pool, Gym, Executive lounge, Parking
room_types: City view rooms, River view rooms, Club rooms, Suites, Accessible rooms
cancellation_policy: Flexible cancellation available. Corporate rates with different terms.
certifications: Business Travel Awards Winner, ISO 14001 Environmental Management
notes: Panoramic views of London Eye and Parliament

name: HTL-2025-0009
hotel_description: The Savoy Grand London is an iconic luxury hotel on the Strand. Art Deco glamour combined with contemporary luxury and impeccable service.
facilities: Multiple restaurants, American Bar, Afternoon tea, Spa, Pool, Fitness suite, Beauty salon, Florist, Theater ticket desk, Luxury shopping arcade
room_types: Superior rooms, Deluxe rooms, Junior suites, One-bedroom suites, Signature suites, Royal suite
cancellation_policy: Varies by rate type. Luxury escapes package requires 21-day notice.
certifications: Forbes 5 Star, AA 5 Red Star, Leading Hotels of the World
notes: Historic hotel - hosted royalty and celebrities since 1889

name: HTL-2025-0010
hotel_description: The Ritz-Carlton London Westminster epitomizes luxury and elegance. Legendary service in an iconic setting overlooking Green Park.
facilities: Michelin-starred restaurant, Palm Court for afternoon tea, Rivoli Bar, Spa, Fitness center, Casino, Private dining, Ballroom
room_types: Deluxe rooms, Executive rooms, Junior suites, Deluxe suites, Signature suites, Royal suite
cancellation_policy: Premium rates require 14-day cancellation notice. Special events may have different policies.
certifications: Forbes 5 Star, Michelin Key, AAA Five Diamond Award
notes: Afternoon tea at The Ritz is world-famous

name: HTL-2025-0011
hotel_description: Backpackers' Haven Singapore offers affordable dormitory and private rooms in Bugis area. Perfect base for exploring Singapore on a budget.
facilities: Common area, Shared kitchen, Laundry, Lockers, Free WiFi, Air conditioning
room_types: Mixed dorms, Female-only dorms, Private doubles
cancellation_policy: 24-hour cancellation policy for full refund.
certifications: Singapore Tourism Board Licensed
notes: Popular with young international travelers

name: HTL-2025-0012
hotel_description: Little India Guest House provides basic accommodation in the colorful Little India district. Experience authentic local culture at budget prices.
facilities: Free WiFi in common areas, Fan rooms available, Shared bathrooms, Tourist information
room_types: Single rooms, Double rooms, Family rooms
cancellation_policy: 48-hour cancellation required for refund.

name: HTL-2025-0013
hotel_description: Chinatown Heritage Hotel offers affordable stays in a restored shophouse. Walking distance to major attractions and MRT stations.

room_types: Standard single, Standard double, Superior rooms, Triple rooms
cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before arrival.

name: HTL-2025-0019
hotel_description: The Raffles Singapore is a legendary colonial-style hotel. An icon of luxury and heritage where the Singapore Sling was invented.
facilities: Multiple award-winning restaurants, Long Bar, Raffles Spa, Pool, Raffles Boutique, Writers Bar, Ballroom, Gardens
room_types: Courtyard suites, Palm Court suites, Residence suites, Promenade suites, Presidential suites
cancellation_policy: Varies by season and rate type. Minimum 14-day notice for suites.

room_types: Deluxe rooms, Premier rooms, Club rooms, Grand Club rooms, Suites, Presidential suite
